attributes.action: Postpone the banning of Incandescent lightbulbs until Dimmer compatible Energy Saving lighbulbs are available
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has announced that there are plans to ban the sale of Incandescent Lightbulbs to force the use of Energy Saving Lightbulbs.

There are currently no Energy Saving lightbulbs available that are compatible with Dimmer switches installed within many peoples homes.

The proposed ban of Incandescent Lightbulbs should therefore be postponed until affordable Dimmer Compatible lightbulbs become available so that people with Dimmer Switches can continue to benefit from their earlier investments in Dimmer Switches
